about_the_game:
The wait is over! The legendary Spanish football management video game, PC Fútbol, is back after many years with new dynamics and the classic spirit!
In this new version of the game, in addition to having the options from 2001, you can also interact with the city to improve the team's performance. Even the referees, credits, suppliers, and employees have been enhanced to offer a more fun and authentic experience!

With the same simplicity that made us enjoy it for years and the new options, PC Fútbol offers a unique and exciting experience that you can't miss.
Don't miss this unique opportunity to be part of the resurgence of one of the most iconic games in the history of football management video games. Reserve your copy of PC Fútbol today and get ready for a completely new and exciting gaming experience!

- Match simulator, to play the matches yourself.
- Simulator visionado, you will be the coach watching how the computer plays, for you.
- The most complete manager, with more than 50 screens and features, such as Alignment, signing, establishing alliances with other clubs, changing headquarters, requesting a change of referee to the federation, you can see your trophies in the showcase, and also grow your youth to take them to the first team.
- Interactive city, you can have full control of where to build your stadium and your other buildings. You will also be able to speculate with the land and build a new stadium and then sell the new one.

The wait is over! The legendary Spanish football management video game, PC Fútbol, is back after many years with new dynamics and the classic spirit!
In this new version of the game, in addition to having the options from 2001, you can also interact with the city to improve the team's performance. Even the referees, credits, suppliers, and employees have been enhanced to offer a more fun and authentic experience!

With the same simplicity that made us enjoy it for years and the new options, PC Fútbol offers a unique and exciting experience that you can't miss.
Don't miss this unique opportunity to be part of the resurgence of one of the most iconic games in the history of football management video games. Reserve your copy of PC Fútbol today and get ready for a completely new and exciting gaming experience!

- Match simulator, to play the matches yourself.
- Simulator visionado, you will be the coach watching how the computer plays, for you.
- The most complete manager, with more than 50 screens and features, such as Alignment, signing, establishing alliances with other clubs, changing headquarters, requesting a change of referee to the federation, you can see your trophies in the showcase, and also grow your youth to take them to the first team.
- Interactive city, you can have full control of where to build your stadium and your other buildings. You will also be able to speculate with the land and build a new stadium and then sell the new one.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core M o Apple M1 o superior
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12
  • Processor: Intel Core M o Apple M1 o superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: PC Futbol 8

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The wait is over! The legendary Spanish football management video game, PC Fútbol, is back after many years with new dynamics and the classic spirit!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal, Catalan*, Basque*, Galician*, Spanish - Latin America*, French, Italian
*languages with full audio support
